00036 IntegratedHcalProcessor::IntegratedHcalProcessor(const std::string processorName) : SiPmPropertiesProcessor(processorName),
00039 
00040     _gainFitConstantsMap(&CALICE::LinearFitConstant::getID),
00041     _gainFitSlopesMap(&CALICE::LinearFitSlope::getID),   
00042     
00043     _MipFitConstantsMap(&CALICE::LinearFitConstant::getID),
00044     _MipFitSlopesMap(&CALICE::LinearFitSlope::getID),
00045     
00046     
00047     _SatCorrMap(&CALICE::SatCorrItep::getIndex),                               
00048     _InterConstantsMap(&CALICE::LinearFitConstant::getID),
00049     
00053     _ahcSroModDataChange(this, &IntegratedHcalProcessor::ahcSroModDataColChanged),
00054     
00055     _temperatureSensorCalibrationChange(this, &IntegratedHcalProcessor::temperatureSensorCalibrationChanged),
00056     
00057     _moduleTypeChange(this, &IntegratedHcalProcessor::moduleTypeChanged),
00058     _moduleLocationChange(this, &IntegratedHcalProcessor::moduleLocationChanged),
00059     _moduleConnectionChange(this, &IntegratedHcalProcessor::moduleConnectionChanged),
00060     _ahcSroModDataCol(0)
00061 
00062   {  
00063     _description = "Integrated data base based handling of the CALICE Hcal";
00064   
00065   registerProcessorParameter("ModuleConnectionCollectionName", "Name of the conditions data collection which describes the connection between modules and the DAQ front-ends (folder /CaliceEcal/module_connection)",
00066                                _colNameModuleConnection, std::string("ModuleConnection"));
00067 
00068   registerProcessorParameter("ModuleLocationCollectionName", "Name of the conditions data collection which contains the description of the module location (folder /CaliceEcal/module_location)",
00069                                _colNameModuleLocation, std::string("ModuleLocation"));
00070 
00071   registerProcessorParameter("ModuleDescriptionCollectionName", "Name of the conditions data collection which contains the description of the module location (folder /CaliceEcal/module_description)",
00072                                _colNameModuleDescription, std::string("ModuleDescription"));
00073 
00074   registerProcessorParameter("ViewMapping", "View the mapping between channels and modules when ever the module location or module connection conditions data change (set to 0 or !=0)",
00075                                _viewConnectionTree, 0);
00076                              
00085            
00086     IntVec modulesExample;
00087     modulesExample.push_back(0);
00088     registerOptionalParameter("Module", "Add calibration for module", _modules, modulesExample, modulesExample.size());
00089 
00090     registerProcessorParameter("AHC_SRO_ModData","Name of the conditions collection for the AHC Slow r/o data.",
00091                              //                           _ahcSroModDataColName, std::string(COL_AHC_SRO_MOD));
00092                                _ahcSroModDataColName, std::string(""));
00093 
00096 
00097     registerProcessorParameter( "GainCalibScalingFactor",
00098                                 "Global scaling factor to gain calibrations for systematic studies",
00099                                 _gainScalingFactor, float( 1. ) );
00100 
00101     registerProcessorParameter( "MipCalibScalingFactor",
00102                                 "Global scaling factor to mip calibrations for systematic studies",
00103                                 _mipScalingFactor, float( 1. ) );
00104

00108                                "",

00110                                std::string("TempSensorCalibCol"));
00111

00115                                std::string("GainFitConstantsCol"));

00172   void IntegratedHcalProcessor::init(){
00173     // change module/chip/channel to temperature extrapolation method here
00174     _tempProvider = new AhcSimpleTempProvider();
00175     _tempProvider->setSanityRange(0,45);
00176 
00177     _mapping.init();
00178     _mapping.setViewConnectionTree(_viewConnectionTree!=0);
00179     SiPmPropertiesProcessor::init();
00180     std::stringstream message;
00181     bool error=false;
00220     if (!marlin::ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener( &_moduleLocationChange,_colNameModuleLocation)) {
00221       message << " " << _colNameModuleLocation;
00222       error = true;
00223     } else {
00224 #ifdef HCALRECO_DEBUG      
00225       std::cout << " IntegratedHcalProcessor: register conditions data handler for module locations " << std::endl;
00226 #endif
00227     }
00228     if (!marlin::ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener( &_moduleConnectionChange, _colNameModuleConnection)) {
00229       message << " " << _colNameModuleConnection;
00230       error = true;
00231     } else {
00232 #ifdef HCALRECO_DEBUG      
00233       std::cout << " IntegratedHcalProcessor: register conditions data handler for module connections " << std::endl;
00234 #endif
00235     }
00236     if (!marlin::ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener( &_moduleTypeChange,_colNameModuleDescription) ) {
00237       message << " " << _colNameModuleDescription;
00238       error = true;
00239     } else {
00240 #ifdef HCALRECO_DEBUG      
00241       std::cout << " IntegratedHcalProcessor: register conditions data handler for module descriptions " << std::endl;
00242 #endif
00243     }
00244     if (!marlin::ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener( 
00245                                                              &_gainFitConstantsMap,
00246                                                              _gainFitConstantsCollectionName) 
00247         ) {
00248       message << " " << _gainFitConstantsCollectionName;
00249 
00250       if(_doGainTempCorr) {
00251         error = true;
00252       }
00253 
00254     }
00255     if (!marlin::ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener( 
00256                                                              &_gainFitSlopesMap,
00257                                                              _gainFitSlopesCollectionName) 
00258         ) {
00259       message << " " << _gainFitSlopesCollectionName;
00260 
00261       if(_doGainTempCorr) {
00262         error = true;
00263       }
00264 
00265     }
00266     if (!marlin::ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener( 
00267                                                              &_MipFitConstantsMap,
00268                                                              _MipFitConstantsCollectionName) 
00269         ) {
00270       message << " " << _MipFitConstantsCollectionName;
00271 
00272       if(_doMipTempCorr) {
00273         error = true;
00274       }
00275 
00276     }
00277     if (!marlin::ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener( 
00278                                                              &_MipFitSlopesMap,
00279                                                              _MipFitSlopesCollectionName) 
00280         ) {
00281       message << " " << _MipFitSlopesCollectionName;
00282 
00283       if(_doMipTempCorr) {
00284         error = true;
00285       }
00286 
00287     }
00288     if (!marlin::ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener( 
00289                                                              &_InterConstantsMap,
00290                                                              _InterConstantsCollectionName) 
00291         ) {
00292       message << " " << _InterConstantsCollectionName;
00293     }
00294 
00295     if (!marlin::ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener( 
00296                                                              &_temperatureSensorCalibrationChange,
00297                                                              _temperatureSensorCalibrationColName) 
00298         ) {
00299       message << " " << _temperatureSensorCalibrationColName;
00300       // We allow to live without temperature sensor calibration.
00301       //error = true;
00302     }
00303 
00304     if ( !marlin::ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener(
00305                                                               &_SatCorrMap,
00306                                                               _SatCorrCollectionName ) ) {
00307       message << " " << _SatCorrCollectionName;
00308     }
00309 
00310     if (error) { 
00311       message <<  ".";
00312       throw ErrorMissingConditionsDataHandler(message.str());
00313     }
00314 
00315     if( !marlin::ConditionsProcessor::registerChangeListener(&_ahcSroModDataChange, _ahcSroModDataColName)) {
00316       std::stringstream message;
00317       message << _processorName <<"::init(): no conditions data handler " << _ahcSroModDataColName;
00318       throw ErrorMissingConditionsDataHandler(message.str());
00319     }
00320     //  for (unsigned short mod=0; mod<HCAL_N_MOD+1; mod++){
00321     //    for (unsigned short cell=0; cell<HCAL_N_CELL; cell++){
00322     //      _lightyield[mod][cell] = 0;
00323     //      _lightyieldError[mod][cell] = 0;
00324     //    }
00325     //  }
00326   };

00382 
00383   };

00431     updateGeometryMaps();

00456   std::pair<unsigned int, unsigned int> IntegratedHcalProcessor::getModuleIDandCellkey(
00457                                                                                        unsigned int module,
00458                                                                                        unsigned int chip,
00459                                                                                        unsigned int channel) {
00460 
00461     short type = 0;
00462     if ( chip > 5 ) ++type;        //  lower part
00463     if ( module > 30 ) type += 2;  //  coarse modules
00464 
00465     unsigned int moduleID = ( module << 8 ) | type;
00466 
00467     unsigned int cellkey = (chip << 8) | channel;
00468 
00469     return std::make_pair(moduleID,cellkey);
00470 
00471   }

00475   /*********************************************************************************/
00476   /*                                                                               */
00477   /*                                                                               */
00478   /*                                                                               */
00479   /*********************************************************************************/
00480   float IntegratedHcalProcessor::getCorrectedAmplitude( int cellID, 
00481                                                         float satAmpl ) {
00482     
00483     try{
00484       SatCorrItep &satCorr = _SatCorrMap.find(cellID);
00485       if ( _doSatScaling != 0 ) {
00486         try {
00487           float scaling = _pixelScaleFactorsMap.find( cellID ).getValue();
00488           satCorr.setScaling( scaling );
00489         } catch ( ... ) {
00490           satCorr.setScaling( _defaultPixelScaleFactor );
00491         }
00492       }
00493 
00494       streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<" Using scaling factor "<< satCorr.getScaling() 
00495                    << " for cell ID " << cellID << std::endl;
00496 
00497       float correctedAmplitude = satCorr.deSaturate(satAmpl);
00498       return correctedAmplitude;
00499       
00500     } catch(lcio::Exception e)
00501       {
00502         streamlog_out(ERROR0) <<" No saturration correction found for cell ID "<<cellID<<endl;
00503       }
00504     return satAmpl;
00505   }
00506   
00507   
00508   float IntegratedHcalProcessor::getSaturatedAmplitude( int cellID,
00509                                                         float linAmpl ) {
00510     try {
00511       SatCorrItep &satCorr = _SatCorrMap.find( cellID );
00512       if ( _doSatScaling != 0 ) {
00513         try {
00514           float scaling = _pixelScaleFactorsMap.find( cellID ).getValue();
00515           satCorr.setScaling( scaling );
00516         } catch ( ... ) {
00517           satCorr.setScaling( _defaultPixelScaleFactor );
00518         }
00519       }
00520 
00521       streamlog_out(DEBUG0)<<" Using scaling factor "<< satCorr.getScaling() 
00522                    << " for cell ID " << cellID << std::endl;
00523 
00524       return satCorr.saturate( linAmpl );
00525     } catch ( lcio::Exception &e ) {
00526       streamlog_out(ERROR0) << "No response curve found for cell ID" 
00527                             << cellID << endl;
00528     }
00529     return linAmpl;
00530   }

00534   /*********************************************************************************/
00535   /*                                                                               */
00536   /*                                                                               */
00537   /*                                                                               */
00538   /*********************************************************************************/
00539   float IntegratedHcalProcessor::getMip( int cellID ) {
00540     
00541     _cellCalibUsedMipTempCorr = false;
00542 
00543     try {
00544       
00545       LinearFitConstant& MipFitConstant = 
00546         _MipFitConstantsMap.find( cellID );
00547       if( _doMipTempCorr ) {
00548         const LinearFitSlope& MipFitSlope = 
00549           _MipFitSlopesMap.find( cellID );
00550         
00551         MipFitConstant.setSlope(MipFitSlope.getSlope());
00552         
00553         const double currentTemperature = getCellTemp( cellID );
00554         
00555         streamlog_out(DEBUG4) << "Using mip temperature dependency"
00556                               << std::endl;
00557         
00558         _cellCalibUsedMipTempCorr=true;
00559         streamlog_out(DEBUG0) << "--getMip() ended" << std::endl; 
00560         
00561         return MipFitConstant.eval(currentTemperature);
00562       } else {
00563         return MipFitConstant.getConstant();
00564       }
00565       
00566     } catch( lcio::Exception &e ) { 
00575     }
00576     return 100000;
00577   }
00578   
00579   
00640 
00641   float IntegratedHcalProcessor::getGain( int cellID ) {
00642     try {
00643       LinearFitConstant& gainFitConstant = 
00644         _gainFitConstantsMap.find( cellID );
00645       
00646       
00647       if( _doGainTempCorr ) {
00648         const LinearFitSlope& gainFitSlope = 
00649           _gainFitSlopesMap.find( cellID );
00650         
00651         gainFitConstant.setSlope(gainFitSlope.getSlope());
00652         
00653         const double currentTemperature = getCellTemp( cellID );
00654         
00655         //            streamlog_out(DEBUG4) << "Using gain temperature dependency\n"
00656         //                << "for " << hti << '\n'
00657         //                << gainFit << std::endl;
00658         
00659         //    std::cout << CALICE::HcalTileIndex(1,1,1) << std::endl;
00660         
00661         _cellCalibUsedGainTempCorr = true;
00662         streamlog_out(DEBUG0) << "--getGain() ended" << std::endl; 
00663         return gainFitConstant.eval(currentTemperature);
00664       } else {
00665         return gainFitConstant.getConstant();
00666       }
00667       
00668     } catch(lcio::Exception e) {
00678     }
00679     return 400;
00680   }
00681   
00710 
00711   float IntegratedHcalProcessor::getIC( int cellID ) {
00712     try{
00713       LinearFitConstant& interConstant =
00714         _InterConstantsMap.find( cellID );
00715       return interConstant.getConstant();
00716     } catch ( ... ){
00717     }
00718     return 10;
00721   }

00750  void IntegratedHcalProcessor::fillTempCountMaps(unsigned int module,
00751                                                   unsigned int chip,
00752                                                   unsigned int channel) {
00753     HcalTileIndex hti( module, chip, channel );
00754     fillTempCountMaps( hti.getIndex() );
00755   }
00756   
00757   void IntegratedHcalProcessor::fillTempCountMaps( int cellID ) {
00758     _cellOccurenceCounter[cellID]++;
00759     
00760     if( _cellCalibUsedMipTempCorr ) {
00761       _cellMipTempCorrCounter[cellID]++;
00762     } else {
00763       _cellNoMipTempCorrCounter[cellID]++;
00764     }
00765     
00766     if( _cellCalibUsedGainTempCorr ) {
00767       _cellGainTempCorrCounter[cellID]++;
00768     } else {
00769       _cellNoGainTempCorrCounter[cellID]++;
00770     }
00771   }
00772   
00773   void IntegratedHcalProcessor::printTempCountMaps( std::ostream& out )
00774   {
00775     std::map<unsigned,unsigned>::const_iterator it;
00776 
00777     for(it=_cellOccurenceCounter.begin(); it!=_cellOccurenceCounter.end(); it++)
00778       {
00779         HcalTileIndex idx( (*it).first );
00780         out //<< std::setw(32) 
00781           << idx << " occured " << std::setw(6) << (*it).second << " times\n";
00782       } 
00783 
00784     for(it=_cellMipTempCorrCounter.begin();
00785         it!=_cellMipTempCorrCounter.end(); it++)
00786       {
00787         HcalTileIndex idx( (*it).first );
00788         out //<< std::setw(32) 
00789           << idx << " was calibrated with temperature corrected mip constant "
00790           << std::setw(6) << (*it).second << " times\n";
00791       } 
00792 
00793     for(it=_cellNoMipTempCorrCounter.begin();
00794         it!=_cellNoMipTempCorrCounter.end(); it++)
00795       {
00796         HcalTileIndex idx( (*it).first );
00797         out //<< std::setw(32) 
00798           << idx<<" was calibrated without temperature corrected mip constant "
00799           << std::setw(6) << (*it).second << " times\n";
00800       } 
00801 
00802     for(it=_cellGainTempCorrCounter.begin();
00803         it!=_cellGainTempCorrCounter.end(); it++)
00804       {
00805         HcalTileIndex idx( (*it).first );
00806         out //<< std::setw(32) 
00807           << idx << " was calibrated with temperature corrected gain constant "
00808           << std::setw(6) << (*it).second << " times\n";
00809       } 
00810 
00811     for(it=_cellNoGainTempCorrCounter.begin();
00812         it!=_cellNoGainTempCorrCounter.end(); it++)
00813       {
00814         HcalTileIndex idx( (*it).first );
00815         out //<< std::setw(32) 
00816           <<idx<<" was calibrated without temperature corrected gain constant "
00817           << std::setw(6) << (*it).second << " times\n";
00818       } 
00819   }

00822   float IntegratedHcalProcessor::getCellTemp( int cellID ){
00823     HcalTileIndex hti( cellID );
00824     return getCellTemp( hti.getModule(), hti.getChip(), hti.getChannel() );
00825   }
00826 
00827 
00828   float IntegratedHcalProcessor::getCellTemp(unsigned int module,
00829                                              unsigned int chip,
00830                                              unsigned int channel) {
00831 
00832     return _tempProvider->getCellTemp(module, chip, channel);
00833 
00834   }

00853 //  // //      const InterConstants* interCalib = _interCalibSet->getCalib(module, cellkey);
00854 //  // //      const MIPConstants* mipCalib = _mipCalibSet->getCalib(module, cellkey);
00855 //  // //      if (mipCalib) {
00856 //  // //        if (gainCalib && interCalib) {   
00857 //  // //         if (gainCalib->calibrationValid() && interCalib->calibrationValid() && mipCalib->calibrationValid()) {
00858 //  // //             _lightyield[mod][cellindex] = interCalib->applyCalibration(gainCalib->applyCalibration(mipCalib->cancelCalibration(1.)));
00859 //  // //#ifdef HCALRECO_DEBUG
00860 //  // //             std::cout << "Begin Lightyield decomposition" << std::endl;
00861 //  // //             std::cout << "mipCalib->cancelCalibration(): " << mipCalib->cancelCalibration(1.) <<std::endl;  
00862 //  // //             std::cout << "gainCalib->applyCalibration(mipCalib->cancelCalibration(1.)): " << gainCalib->applyCalibration(mipCalib->cancelCalibration(1.)) << std::endl;  
00863 //  // //             std::cout << "interCalib->applyCalibration(gainCalib->applyCalibration(mipCalib->cancelCalibration(1.)))" << interCalib->applyCalibration(gainCalib->applyCalibration(mipCalib->cancelCalibration(1.))) << std::endl;
00864 //  // //              std::cout << "lightyield (" << mod << ", " << cellindex << "):" << _lightyield[mod][cellindex] << std::endl;
00865 //  // //             std::cout << "End Lightyield decomposition" << std::endl;
00866 //  // //#endif
00867 //  // //              if(_correctSatLY == true) {

00876 //  // //                                      << '\n';

00883 //  // //             _lightyieldError[mod][cellindex] = 0;
00884 //  // //#ifdef HCALRECO_DEBUG
00885 //  // //              std::cout << "lightyield (" << mod << ", " << cellindex << "):" << _lightyield[mod][cellindex] << std::endl;
00886 //  // //#endif

00896 //  // //#endif
00897 //  // //        }
00898 //  // //      } else {

00901 //  // //#endif
00902 //  // //      }        
00903 //  // //    }

00908   void IntegratedHcalProcessor::establishTileCoverage(const unsigned mainCellIndex, const int rowOffset, const int columnOffset) {
00909     const HcalCellIndex _mainCellIndex(mainCellIndex);
00910     HcalCellIndex _coveredCellIndex(mainCellIndex);
00911     const unsigned short _row = _coveredCellIndex.getTileRow();
00912     const unsigned short _column = _coveredCellIndex.getTileColumn();
00913     _coveredCellIndex.setTileRow(_row+rowOffset).setTileColumn(_column+columnOffset);
00914     _cellMap.insert(std::make_pair(_coveredCellIndex.getCellIndex(), _mainCellIndex.getCellIndex()));
00915 #ifdef HCALDIGI_DEBUG
00916     std::cout << "establishing coverage of " << std::hex << _coveredCellIndex.getCellIndex() << " by " << _mainCellIndex.getCellIndex() << std::dec << std::endl;
00917 #endif  
00918   };
00919 
00920 
00921  void IntegratedHcalProcessor::considerNeighbourRelation(const unsigned centralCellIndex, const int rowOffset, const int columnOffset) {
00922 
00923 #ifdef HCALDIGI_DEBUG
00924     std::cout << "considering " << std::hex << centralCellIndex << std::dec << " " << rowOffset << " " << columnOffset << std::endl;
00925 #endif
00926     const HcalCellIndex _centralCellIndex(centralCellIndex);
00927     const unsigned short _row = _centralCellIndex.getTileRow();
00928     const unsigned short _column = _centralCellIndex.getTileColumn();
00929     HcalCellIndex _neighbourCellIndex(centralCellIndex);
00930     _neighbourCellIndex.setTileRow(_row+rowOffset).setTileColumn(_column+columnOffset);
00931 #ifdef HCALDIGI_DEBUG
00932     std::cout << " checking neighbour " << std::hex << _neighbourCellIndex.getCellIndex() << std::dec << std::endl;
00933 #endif
00934     const std::map<unsigned,unsigned>::const_iterator _aCell=_cellMap.find(_neighbourCellIndex.getCellIndex());
00935     if (_aCell==_cellMap.end()) {
00936 #ifdef HCALDIGI_DEBUG
00937       std::cout << "neighbour not in map" << std::endl;
00938 #endif  
00939       return;
00940     }  
00941     const std::map<unsigned,unsigned>::const_iterator _centralCell=_cellMap.find(_centralCellIndex.getCellIndex());
00942     if (_centralCell==_cellMap.end()) {
00943       throw logic_error("every cell center should be in the list of cells!");
00944       return;
00945     }  
00946 #ifdef HCALDIGI_DEBUG
00947     std::cout << "  " << std::hex << _neighbourCellIndex.getCellIndex() << std::dec << " belongs to " << std::hex << _aCell->second << std::dec << std::endl;
00948     std::cout << "  " << std::hex << _centralCellIndex.getCellIndex() << std::dec << " belongs to " << std::hex << _centralCell->second << std::dec << std::endl;
00949 #endif  
00950     // check that the cell is not occupied by the same tile
00951     if (_aCell->second==_centralCell->second) {
00952 #ifdef HCALDIGI_DEBUG  
00953       std::cout << "neighbour and central cell are the same" << std::endl;
00954 #endif    
00955       return;
00956     } 
00957     // check if there is already a list of neighbours for the central cell
00958     const std::pair<unsigned, unsigned> central_module_and_cell_index=_indexLookup.getModuleAndCellIndex(_mapping, _centralCell->second);
00959     const unsigned short centralModule = _mapping.getModuleID(central_module_and_cell_index.first);
00960     const unsigned short centralModuleType = _mapping.getModuleType(central_module_and_cell_index.first);
00961     const unsigned short centralChip = central_module_and_cell_index.second / 18 + (((centralModuleType==5) || (centralModuleType==7)) ? 6 : 0);
00962     const unsigned short centralChannel = central_module_and_cell_index.second % 18;
00963 #ifdef HCALDIGI_DEBUG
00964     std::cout << "  central: " << centralModule << ", " << centralChip << ", " << centralChannel << std::endl;
00965 #endif  
00966     const unsigned centralKey = (centralModule << 16) + (centralChip << 8) + centralChannel;
00967     NeighbourMap::iterator neighbourEntry = _neighbourMap.find(centralKey);
00968     if (neighbourEntry==_neighbourMap.end()) {
00969 #ifdef HCALDIGI_DEBUG
00970       std::cout << "   new central cell " << std::hex << centralKey << std::dec << std::endl;
00971 #endif  
00972       std::vector<NeighbourItem>* _neighbourVector = new std::vector<NeighbourItem>;
00973       neighbourEntry = _neighbourMap.insert(make_pair(centralKey,_neighbourVector)).first;
00974     }
00975     // insert new neighbour relation
00976     const std::pair<unsigned, unsigned> neighbour_module_and_cell_index=_indexLookup.getModuleAndCellIndex(_mapping, _aCell->second);
00977     NeighbourItem aNeighbourItem;
00978     aNeighbourItem.module = _mapping.getModuleID(neighbour_module_and_cell_index.first);
00979     const unsigned short neighbourModuleType = _mapping.getModuleType(neighbour_module_and_cell_index.first);
00980     const unsigned short neighbourChip = neighbour_module_and_cell_index.second / 18 + (((neighbourModuleType==5) || (neighbourModuleType==7)) ? 6 : 0);
00981     const unsigned short neighbourChannel = neighbour_module_and_cell_index.second % 18;
00982 #ifdef HCALDIGI_DEBUG
00983     std::cout << "(" << centralModule << ", " << centralChip << ", " << centralChannel << ") and (" << 
00984       aNeighbourItem.module << ", " << neighbourChip << ", " << neighbourChannel << ") are neighbours " << std::endl;
00985 #endif
00986     aNeighbourItem.cellkey = (neighbourChip << 8) + neighbourChannel;
00987     aNeighbourItem.weight = 1;
00988     bool found=false;
00989     for (std::vector<NeighbourItem>::iterator vectorIter = neighbourEntry->second->begin(); vectorIter !=neighbourEntry->second->end(); vectorIter++) {
00990       if ((aNeighbourItem.module == vectorIter->module) && (aNeighbourItem.cellkey == vectorIter->cellkey)) {
00991         vectorIter->weight++;
00992         found = true;
00993       }
00994     }
00995     if (!found) neighbourEntry->second->push_back(aNeighbourItem);
00996   };
00997   
00998 
00999   void IntegratedHcalProcessor::updateGeometryMaps() {
01000 
01001     if (SiPmPropertiesProcessor::empty() || !_mapping.isModuleConditionsDataComplete()) return;
01002 #ifdef HCALDIGI_DEBUG
01003     std::cout << "calculating neighbour maps" << std::endl;
01004 #endif
01005     _inverseModuleMap.clear();
01006 
01007     for (unsigned _moduleIndex = 0;  _moduleIndex < _mapping.getNModules(); _moduleIndex++) {
01008       _inverseModuleMap[(_mapping.getModuleID(_moduleIndex) << 8) + 
01009                         (unsigned short)_mapping.getModuleType(_moduleIndex)-4] = _moduleIndex;    
01010     }
01011 
01012     _cellMap.clear();
01013     const unsigned short minimalTileSize = 3;
01014     for (unsigned short _moduleIndex = 0; _moduleIndex < _mapping.getNModules(); _moduleIndex++) {
01015       const unsigned short _module = _mapping.getModuleID(_moduleIndex);
01016       //  _module ^= module number [1-38]
01017       //  _moduleIndex = 2*layer - 1
01018 #ifdef HCALDIGI_DEBUG
01019       std::cout << "_module " << _module << " _moduleIndex " << _moduleIndex << std::endl;
01020       std::cout << _moduleIndex << ", " << _mapping.getModuleID(_moduleIndex) << ", " << (unsigned) _mapping.getModuleType(_moduleIndex) << std::endl;
01021 #endif  
01022       const unsigned firstIndex = (_mapping.getModuleType(_moduleIndex) == 7) ? 39 : 0 ;
01023       const unsigned lastIndex = (_mapping.getModuleType(_moduleIndex) == 6) ? 72 : 108 ;
01024       for (unsigned short _cellIndex = firstIndex; _cellIndex != lastIndex; _cellIndex++) {
01025         const unsigned short _channel = _cellIndex % 18;
01026         const unsigned short _chip = (_cellIndex-_channel) / 18 + (((_mapping.getModuleType(_moduleIndex)==5) || (_mapping.getModuleType(_moduleIndex)==7)) ? 6 : 0);      
01027         const HcalCellIndex _geomCellIndex(_mapping.getGeometricalCellIndex(_moduleIndex, _cellIndex));
01028 #ifdef HCALDIGI_DEBUG
01029         std::cout << "module: " << _moduleIndex << " cell: " << _cellIndex << " " << std::hex << _geomCellIndex.getCellIndex() << std::dec << std::endl; 
01030         std::pair<unsigned, unsigned> test_module_and_cell_index=_indexLookup.getModuleAndCellIndex(_mapping, _geomCellIndex);
01031         std::cout << "module: " << test_module_and_cell_index.first << " cell:" << test_module_and_cell_index.second << std::endl;
01032         if ((test_module_and_cell_index.first!=_moduleIndex) || (test_module_and_cell_index.second!=_cellIndex)) {
01033           throw logic_error("inverse cellmapping incorrect");
01034         }
01035 #endif     
01036         const unsigned short _tileSize = getTileSize(_module, _chip, _channel);
01037 #ifdef HCALDIGI_DEBUG
01038         std::cout << " considering (module, chip, channel) " << _module << ", " << _chip << ", " << ", " << _channel << std::endl;
01039         std::cout << "    " << std::hex << _geomCellIndex.getCellIndex() << std::dec << ", " << _tileSize << std::endl;
01040 #endif      
01041         establishTileCoverage(_geomCellIndex.getCellIndex(), 0, 0);
01042         if (_tileSize>minimalTileSize) {
01043           establishTileCoverage(_geomCellIndex.getCellIndex(), minimalTileSize, 0);
01044           establishTileCoverage(_geomCellIndex.getCellIndex(), 0, minimalTileSize);
01045           establishTileCoverage(_geomCellIndex.getCellIndex(), minimalTileSize, minimalTileSize);
01046           if (_tileSize>2*minimalTileSize) {
01047             establishTileCoverage(_geomCellIndex.getCellIndex(), 0, 2*minimalTileSize);
01048             establishTileCoverage(_geomCellIndex.getCellIndex(), minimalTileSize, 2*minimalTileSize);
01049             establishTileCoverage(_geomCellIndex.getCellIndex(), 2*minimalTileSize, 2*minimalTileSize);
01050             establishTileCoverage(_geomCellIndex.getCellIndex(), 2*minimalTileSize, minimalTileSize);
01051             establishTileCoverage(_geomCellIndex.getCellIndex(), 2*minimalTileSize, 0);
01052             establishTileCoverage(_geomCellIndex.getCellIndex(), 0, 3*minimalTileSize);
01053             establishTileCoverage(_geomCellIndex.getCellIndex(), minimalTileSize, 3*minimalTileSize);
01054             establishTileCoverage(_geomCellIndex.getCellIndex(), 2*minimalTileSize, 3*minimalTileSize);
01055             establishTileCoverage(_geomCellIndex.getCellIndex(), 3*minimalTileSize, 3*minimalTileSize);
01056             establishTileCoverage(_geomCellIndex.getCellIndex(), 3*minimalTileSize, 2*minimalTileSize);
01057             establishTileCoverage(_geomCellIndex.getCellIndex(), 3*minimalTileSize, minimalTileSize);
01058             establishTileCoverage(_geomCellIndex.getCellIndex(), 3*minimalTileSize, 0);
01059           }
01060         }
01061       }
01062     
01063     } 
01064     for (NeighbourMap::iterator mapIter = _neighbourMap.begin(); mapIter != _neighbourMap.end(); mapIter++) {
01065       delete mapIter->second;
01066     }
01067     _neighbourMap.clear();
01068     for (std::map<unsigned,unsigned>::iterator mapIter=_cellMap.begin(); mapIter!=_cellMap.end(); mapIter++) {
01069       //     const unsigned short _centralModule = (mapIter->first & 0xFF0000) >> 16;
01070       //     const unsigned short _centralChip = (mapIter->first & 0x00FF00) >> 8; 
01071       //     const unsigned short _centralChannel = mapIter->first & 0x0000FF; 
01072       considerNeighbourRelation(mapIter->first, -minimalTileSize, 0);
01073       considerNeighbourRelation(mapIter->first, minimalTileSize, 0);
01074       considerNeighbourRelation(mapIter->first, 0, -minimalTileSize);
01075       considerNeighbourRelation(mapIter->first, 0, minimalTileSize);
01076     }
01077 #ifdef HCALDIGI_DEBUG
01078     std::cout << "scaling weights" << std::endl;
01079 #endif
01080     for (NeighbourMap::iterator mapIter = _neighbourMap.begin(); mapIter != _neighbourMap.end(); mapIter++) {
01081       const unsigned short _centralModule = (mapIter->first & 0xFF0000) >> 16;
01082       const unsigned short _centralChip = (mapIter->first & 0x00FF00) >> 8; 
01083       const unsigned short _centralChannel = mapIter->first & 0x0000FF; 
01084       const unsigned short _centraltileSize = getTileSize(_centralModule, _centralChip, _centralChannel);
01085 #ifdef HCALDIGI_DEBUG
01086       std::cout << "(" << _centralModule << ", " << _centralChip << ", " << _centralChannel << ") has neighbours: " << std::endl;
01087 #endif    
01088       for (std::vector<NeighbourItem>::iterator vectorIter = mapIter->second->begin(); vectorIter != mapIter->second->end(); vectorIter++) {
01089         const unsigned short _chip = (vectorIter->cellkey & 0xFF00) >> 8;
01090         const unsigned short _channel = vectorIter->cellkey & 0x00FF;
01091         const unsigned short _tileSize = getTileSize(vectorIter->module, _chip, _channel);
01092         if (_tileSize) {
01093           vectorIter->weight = vectorIter->weight / 4 / (_centraltileSize/minimalTileSize);
01094 #ifdef HCALDIGI_DEBUG
01095           std::cout << "  (" << vectorIter->module << ", " << _chip << ", " << _channel << ") " << vectorIter->weight << std::endl; 
01096 #endif
01097         } else {
01098           throw runtime_error("no tilesize available or invalid tilesize");
01099         }       
01100       }
01101     }
01102   };
01103 
01104   std::vector<IntegratedHcalProcessor::NeighbourItem>* IntegratedHcalProcessor::getNeighbourList(const unsigned short module, const unsigned cellkey) const {
01105     const unsigned _completeCellkey = (module << 16) + cellkey;
01106     NeighbourMap::const_iterator neighbourEntry = _neighbourMap.find(_completeCellkey);
01107     if (neighbourEntry==_neighbourMap.end()) {
01108 #ifdef HCALDIGI_DEBUG
01109       std::cout << "cell not in neighbour list: size of list " << _neighbourMap.size() << " "<< module << " " << std::hex << cellkey << " -> " << _completeCellkey << std::dec << std::endl;
01110 #endif    
01111       return 0;
01112     }  
01113     return neighbourEntry->second;
01114   } 
01115 
01116   int IntegratedHcalProcessor::reverseLookup(int I, int J, int K) const {
01117 
01118     streamlog_out(DEBUG) << "reverseLookup() called\n";
01119 
01120     const HcalCellIndex hci(J, I, K);
01121 
01122     const int aTileRow = hci.getTileRow();
01123     const int aTileColumn = hci.getTileColumn();
01124     const int aLayer = hci.getLayerIndex();
01125 
01126     const std::pair<unsigned, unsigned> module_and_cell_index = 
01127       _indexLookup.getModuleAndCellIndex(_mapping, hci);
01128 
01129     const unsigned _moduleIndex = module_and_cell_index.first;
01130 
01131     if (_moduleIndex==0xFF) {
01132       streamlog_out(WARNING) << "unknown module (" 
01133                              << "J: " << aTileRow << ", " 
01134                              << "I: " << aTileColumn  << ", " 
01135                              << "K: " << aLayer 
01136                              << ")" 
01137                              << std::endl;
01138     }
01139 
01140     const unsigned short _moduleType = _mapping.getModuleType(_moduleIndex);
01141     const unsigned _cellIndex = module_and_cell_index.second;
01142 
01143     if (_cellIndex==0xFF) {
01144       streamlog_out(WARNING) << "unknown cell (" 
01145                              << "J: " << aTileRow << ", " 
01146                              << "I: " << aTileColumn  << ", " 
01147                              << "K: " << aLayer << ")" 
01148                              << std::endl;
01149     }
01150 
01151     const unsigned chip = 
01152       _cellIndex / 18 + (((_moduleType == 5) || (_moduleType == 7)) ? 6 : 0);
01153 
01154     const unsigned channel = _cellIndex % 18;
01155 
01156     /*
01157       modulenumber is the module production number, 1-38
01158     */
01159     const unsigned int modulenumber = _mapping.getModuleID(_moduleIndex);
01160 
01161     streamlog_out(DEBUG) << "reverseLookup() finished" << std::endl;
01162 
01163     return CALICE::HcalTileIndex(modulenumber, chip, channel).getIndex();
01164 
01165   }
01166 
01167   int IntegratedHcalProcessor::geometricalLookup(int module, int chip, int channel) {
01168 
01169     short type = 0;
01170     if ( chip > 5 ) ++type;        //  lower part
01171     if ( module > 30 ) type += 2;  //  coarse modules
01172 
01173     int moduleID = ( module << 8 ) | type;
01174 
01175     unsigned _moduleIndex = _inverseModuleMap[moduleID];
01176     unsigned _cellIndex = channel + chip * 18;
01177 
01178     if (_cellIndex>107) _cellIndex=_cellIndex-108; 
01179 
01180     return _mapping.getGeometricalCellIndex(_moduleIndex, _cellIndex);
01181     
01182   }
01183 
01184 };
